value.title: Headspace Health acquires AI-powered mental health and wellness company Sayana
value.excerpt: Headspace Health has acquired Sayana, an AI-powered mental health and wellness company, for an undisclosed amount. Headspace Health says the acquisition of the San Francisco-based company will expand its ability to provide personalized self-care to its users.

value.title: AI Standards Hub will help UK businesses improve AI governance
value.excerpt: The launch of the initiative, led by the Alan Turing Institute, comes as 1.3 million UK businesses are expected to use AI by 2040

value.title: Snowflake Stock Looks Like A Buy At $300
value.excerpt: Cloud-based data warehousing specialist Snowflake stock (NYSE: SNOW) stock has declined by almost 15% over the last month, trading at about $300 per share currently. The decline comes on the back of a broader sell-off in software names and high-multiple

value.title: Five Revenue Models That Can Drive Growth For AI Startups
value.excerpt: However, true AI startups — ones whose products are built on proprietary, computational, deep-tech AI — are just now emerging in larger numbers, finding markets for their technology among a wide range of industries eager to automate their businesses.

value.title: Can Humans Teach Robots To Think Like Us?
value.excerpt: Teaching robots to think like humans may be the next frontier for tech developers and researchers involved in the ongoing development of technologies such as AI and robotics.

value.title: How An Ethical AI Startup Makes A Triple-Bottom Line Impact
value.excerpt: Even tech companies can consider people and planet, as well as profit. And they can find investors who share their social mission.

value.title: Fomo launches “Fomo Robotics” to offer UV Disinfection Machines

value.title: AI/ML at scale: The next horizon for PPG’s data strategy
value.excerpt: At PPG, data is key not only to IT strategy, but to enabling business strategy, says Jeff Lipniskis, global IT director. With a solid foundation in place, his focus now is on being AI ready.

value.title: Government backs Turing Institute in bid to set global AI technical standards
value.excerpt: The DCMS has announced an AI Standards Hub, comprising The Alan Turing Institute, the National Physical Laboratory and the British Standards Institution to set a global bar for AI technical standards.

value.title: How managed services will evolve in 2022: The data analytics revolution
value.excerpt: In 2022, cloud managed service providers look to support decision-makers in configuring and maintaining data stored in cloud environments.

value.title: Robo Inu Finance Aims to Create a New Era of Payment Methods Using the Fintech Industry
value.excerpt: Robu Inu Finance was born with the vision to build an open ecosystem for everyone regardless of their age or background to gain financial freedom. They are creating a financial tool for individuals to manage their finances better and for companies to leverage an AI to enhance people's lives in the fintech industry.

value.title: An AI-Created Politician Draws the Attention as Deep Learning Technology Expands
value.excerpt: In Seoul, South Korea, an AI-created model, an avatar of a politician — candidate Al Yoon Suk-yeol — draws the attention of the crowds on a big screen. DeepBrain AI’s human model was the result of hundreds of hours of recorded video used to learn the person’s voice,

value.title: Cogniteam’s Nimbus Supports Cloud-Enabled Robot Deployment Powered by NVIDIA Jetson Edge AI Platform
value.excerpt: Cogniteam integrates NVIDIA Isaac GEMs into Nimbus, streamlining robotics from development to deployment leveraging the NVIDIA Jetson platform

value.title: Amazon (AMZN) Boosts AWS Portfolio with New EC2 Instances
value.excerpt: AWS announces the general availability of purpose-built Amazon EC2 instances, Hpc6a, which are designed for HPC workloads.

value.title: Synthetic data platform Mostly AI lands $25M
value.excerpt: Mostly AI, a startup that uses AI to create synthetic data for enterprises, today raised $25 million in a Series B round of funding.

value.title: Text autocompletion systems aim to ease our lives, but there are risks
value.excerpt: Text autocompletion technology uses AI to help us to write emails and messages by suggesting words and even entire sentences. But bias can creep into these systems.

value.title: Tesla Full Self-Driving has an 'Assertive' mode that can make rolling stops
value.excerpt: Tesla's polarizing Full Self-Driving beta software is back with another round of controversy. Now included with the software are profiles that change the behavior of the software, and one selection may engage in behavior that violates US traffic laws.

value.title: Open the pod bay doors, please, HAL: Meta's AI simulates lip-reading

value.title: Guardrail failure: Companies are losing revenue and customers due to AI bias
value.excerpt: New survey finds that 80% U.S. firms found problems despite having bias monitoring or algorithm tests already in place.
